title: The Alias [Paperback] Mandi Slack [Paperback] Mandi Slack [Paperback] Mandi Slack [Paperback] Mandi Slack [Paperback] Mandi Slack
description: After a long and difficult divorce, Jacey thinks the worst is over. Little does she know she'll soon be forced to go undercover to protect her family, and in the process, she'll risk losing her identity, her future, and her heart. With a lightning pace, a good dose of humor, and a plot that's full of suspense, this thrilling novel is an edge-of-your-seat read.
author: Mandi Slack
